title: Keyword Research - MozMoz logoMenu openMenu closeSearchMoz logo
description: Your all-in-one suite of SEO essentials.
content: By: Tom Casano November 13, 2018 The Advanced Guide to Keyword Clustering Keyword Research | Content Marketing Keyword clustering can help you optimize a single page for many keywords and improve your ranking potential, but it's often ignored. Learn how to make the most of your content with this advanced guide to keyword clustering. Read this post By: Bill Sebald October 22, 2018 How to Get More Keyword Metrics for Your Target Keywords Keyword Research | SEO Tools Leverage the Google Search Console API to get a ton of detailed data about your keywords without having to get too technical about it. Bill Sebald shares a straightforward shortcut using Google Sheets and the Supermetrics add-on. Read this post By: Jeff Baker August 14, 2018 Ranking the 6 Most Accurate Keyword Difficulty Tools SEO Tools | Keyword Research How well can a keyword research tool predict where you'll rank? See which of the top 6 keyword research tools scored highest in this correlations study conducted by Brafton. Read this post By: Jeff Baker June 11, 2018 How a Few Pages Can Make or Break Your Website Content Marketing | Advanced SEO | Keyword Research When even a fraction of your pages rank well for a high-intent query, the impact on your traffic can be astonishing. But to see surprising results, the process for creating content needs to be rigorous and heavily supported by data. Read this post By: Erin McCaul April 24, 2018 The SEO Quick Fix: Competitor Keywords, Redirect Chains, and Duplicate Content, Oh My! Moz Tools | Technical SEO | Keyword Research From finding the keywords your competitors rank for to identifying redirect chains that impede crawlers, we've highlighted 4 common SEO issues that Moz Pro can help solve. Check out four quick videos designed to help level up your skills and get the most out of the tools. Read this post By: Britney Muller March 9, 2018 How to Discover Featured Snippet Opportunities for SEO Whiteboard Friday | Advanced SEO | Keyword Research Winning featured snippets is competitive, but it's one of the best ways to get visibility on page 1 of Google's SERPs. In this Whiteboard Friday, Britney Muller covers the first three steps you can take toward earning the true top spot on results pages and shares useful tools to help. Read this post By: Rand Fishkin January 12, 2018 Why Google AdWords' Keyword Volume Numbers Are Wildly Unreliable Keyword Research | Whiteboard Friday Broad and unusable volume ranges, misalignment with other Google tools, and conflating similar yet distinct keywords — these are just a few of the serious issues that make relying on AdWords search volume data alone so dangerous. In this edition of Whiteboard Friday, we discuss those issues and offer a few alternatives for more accurate volume data. Read this post By: Britney Muller December 12, 2017 Keyword Research Beats Nate Silver's 2016 Presidential Election Prediction Keyword Research Can keyword research be a more powerful indicator of people's behavior than traditional methods of prediction, such as exit polling? Inspired by the controversy and confusion around US elections, we decided to test the theory. Read this post By: Jo Cameron November 20, 2017 Geomodified Searches, Localized Results, and How to Track the Right Keywords and Locations for Your Business - Next Level Keyword Research | Local SEO | SEO Basics No matter what kind of site you work on, local SEO will likely have an impact on how your site shows in the SERPs. Jo explains how any business can take advantage of local SEO know-how to win online. Read this post By: Dr. Peter J. Meyers November 7, 2017 How to Do a Keyword-Driven Content Audit (with Keyword Explorer) Technical SEO | Moz Tools | Keyword Research How do you find the hidden gems in your outdated content? Dr. Pete walks through a step-by-step process to find your highest potential content using keywords it already ranks on. Includes bonus Google Sheet. Read this post By: Hayley Sherman November 2, 2017 How to Use Keyword Explorer to Identify Competitive Keyword Opportunities Moz Tools | Keyword Research Learn how to use Keyword Explorer's new feature allowing you to search for keywords by site in this detailed (and doughnut-laden) walkthrough. Read this post By: Rand Fishkin October 27, 2017 How to Use the "Keywords by Site" Data in Tools to Improve Your Keyword Research and Targeting Keyword Research | Whiteboard Friday | SEO Tools There's a powerful concept in the world of SEO software: the "keyword universe." Learn how to harness the potential of tens of millions of keywords and their rankings data in this edition of Whiteboard Friday. Read this post By: Rand Fishkin October 23, 2017 NEW in Keyword Explorer: See Who Ranks & How Much with Keywords by Site Keyword Research | Moz Tools | Moz News Keyword Explorer can show you which keywords you and your competitors already rank for. Get the freshest, most accurate keyword rankings data here. Read this post By: Britney Muller July 26, 2017 The Lazy Writer’s Guide to 30-Minute Keyword Research Keyword Research | Content Marketing | SEO Copywriting Keyword research doesn’t have to be a marathon bender. A brisk 30-minute walk can provide incredible insights — insights that connect you with a wider audience on a deeper level. Read this post
